summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 CHEVROLET MALIBU. THE CONTACT STATED THAT AFTER STARTING THE VEHICLE AND TURNING THE LIGHT SWITCH TO THE ON POSITION, THE HEAD LIGHTS FAILED TO ILLUMINATE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHO REPLACED THE LIGHT BULBS BUT THE APPROXIMATELY 2 MONTHS LATER THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE LIGHT BULBS WERE REPLACED A SECOND TIME BUT THE FAILURE PERSISTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 61,000.
